Card.Name: Candy Chain
Card.Description: After you play a spell, shuffle a Candy Link into your opponent's deck, and remove 1 durability from this relic.

Card.Name: Snowshaper Pallas
Card.Description: Roar & Ability: Transform a creature into a 0/1 Snow Statue with "Can't attack".

Card.Name: Avalanche Watcher
Card.Description: Backline. Roar: Expend all of your available mana. This creature gains +1/+1 for each mana expended.

Card.Name: Pallas' Wanderwagon
Card.Description: Frontline. After a spell is cast, swap this creature's strength and health.

Card.Name: Frost Queen Neferu
Card.Description: Each turn, after the first time your opponent draws a card, plays a card, uses their god power, and attacks with their relic, their god takes 2 damage.

Card.Name: Spirit Storm
Card.Description: Trigger the afterlife of each friendly creature.

Card.Name: Frozen Rest
Card.Description: Pick one — • Destroy your opponent's relic, or • Target two creatures. They go to sleep.

Card.Name: The Reinnapper
Card.Description: Roar: Obliterate a creature with mana cost 3 or less. Afterlife: Summon a base copy of that creature for its controller.

Card.Name: Unexpected Gift
Card.Description: Roar: Heal each god for 3. Afterlife: Shuffle a base copy of this creature into your opponent's deck.

Card.Name: Frosty Fruit
Card.Description: Afterlife: Deal 1 damage to the weakest enemy creature.

Card.Name: Reinbadger
Card.Description: Blitz.

Card.Name: Candy Link
Card.Description: Casts when drawn. Discard a random card, then draw a card.

Card.Name: Snow Statue
Card.Description: Can't attack.

Card.Name: Freeze!
Card.Description: Transform a creature into a 0/1 Snow Statue with "Can't attack".

Card.Name: Naughty
Card.Description: Pull a creature from the board to the top of its controller's deck.

Card.Name: Nice
Card.Description: Give +2/+2 to the Chosen One.

Card.Name: Ice Breaker
Card.Description: Destroy your opponent's relic.

Card.Name: Cold Slumber
Card.Description: Target two creatures. They go to sleep.

Card.Name: Argus, The White Wall
Card.Description: Frontline. Armor 1. After a creature's maximum health increases (other than Argus, The White Wall's), this creature gains the same amount of health.

Card.Name: Raneko Hearthmother
Card.Description: Ally: Give the summoned creature +2 health.

Card.Name: Aegis of the Innocent
Card.Description: After a friendly character takes damage, heal it for 1. Roar: Gain durability equal to the number of Olympians in your void.

Card.Name: Master of the Mill
Card.Description: Ally: Give -1 strength to a friendly creature. Draw a card.

Card.Name: Camaraderie
Card.Description: Draw two Olympians. If a card drawn this way has a mana cost of 3 or less, summon it instead.

Card.Name: Reios, The Old Wolf
Card.Description: Blitz. Afterlife: Give this creature's strength, health, and afterlife to a random Olympian in your hand.

Card.Name: Benevolent Broker
Card.Description: Ally: Give +1/+1 to each Olympian in your hand.

Card.Name: Ashen Child
Card.Description: Afterlife: Give +1/+1 to each Olympian in your hand.

Card.Name: Retribution
Card.Description: Deal 2 damage to a creature. If you have a creature with 6 strength or more in hand, deal 6 damage instead.

Card.Name: Wolf Recruits
Card.Description: Draw a War creature and give it +1/+1. If its mana cost is 5 or less, draw another War creature and give it +1/+1.

Card.Name: Divya, The Deadly Serenade
Card.Description: After a friendly Amazon deals damage (other than Divya, The Deadly Serenade), deal 2 damage to the same target.

Card.Name: Fae Thornblade
Card.Description: Ally: Deal 1 damage.

Card.Name: Great Eye's Blessing
Card.Description: Add a base copy of each friendly creature to your hand. Refresh 1 mana for each card added this way.

Card.Name: Poison Dart
Card.Description: Deadly. Deal 1 damage to a creature.

Card.Name: Beastfury Protege
Card.Description: Ally: Summon a 1/1 Spirit Hound.

Card.Name: Gama, Lord of Berries
Card.Description: Godblitz. Roar: Destroy each weaker creature. For each creature destroyed, obliterate a card from the top of your opponent's deck.

Card.Name: Spore-Light Lantern
Card.Description: Afterlife: If you control a Nether, equip a 4/1 Spore-Light Lantern.

Card.Name: Dark Deliverance
Card.Description: Pull a friendly Nether from the board to your hand. If you do, summon a 1/1 Leyshadow.

Card.Name: Vulpine Shadowshifter
Card.Description: Hidden for 1 turn. Ally: Transform this creature into a base copy of a friendly creature.

Card.Name: Shrike Assassin
Card.Description: Flank. After this creature attacks and survives, pull it from the board to your hand, and reduce its mana cost to 0.

Card.Name: Giramonte, Boon Tinkerer
Card.Description: After you summon a Structure, add a 1 mana 1/1 copy of it to your hand.

Card.Name: Automabunn
Card.Description: Ally: Target a Structure. Transform it into a base copy of another Structure.

Card.Name: Entrapment Apparatus
Card.Description: Frontline. Can't attack. After your opponent summons a creature, gain +2 health.

Card.Name: Arcane Fabrication
Card.Description: Summon a 1/1 base copy of a friendly Structure.

Card.Name: Elder Strix
Card.Description: After your opponent draws a card, increase its mana cost by 1 (Max 9).

Card.Name: Chira, The Spiritspeaker
Card.Description: Backline. Ally: Transform a creature into a 3/3 Rancorous Spirit.

Card.Name: Bitter Endings
Card.Description: Until the end of your turn, after your god takes damage, deal 1 damage to your opponent's god.

Card.Name: Spiritspeaker Chime
Card.Description: At the end of your turn, if your god has taken damage this turn, summon a 3/3 Rancorous Spirit.

Card.Name: Raneko Revenant
Card.Description: Ally: Deal 1 damage to each god.

Card.Name: Perseverance
Card.Description: Summon three 1/1 Zombies to attack a target. If a Zombie summoned this way is destroyed, summon another Zombie.

Card.Name: Hortuk, Fallen Commander
Card.Description: Roar: Pick one — • Gain blitz and protected, or • Gain frontline and leech. Afterlife: Summon two 3/3 Fallen Legions, each with one of the unchosen keywords.

Card.Name: Eiko, Undaunted Duelist
Card.Description: Roar: Destroy your opponent's relic and any cards of the same name in their hand or deck.

Card.Name: Carrion-Eater
Card.Description: After this creature attacks, obliterate the top two cards of your opponent's void. If a creature is obliterated this way, gain +1 health.

Card.Name: Shalefire Hatchling
Card.Description: After your opponent plays a card, gain protected and perform an extra attack on their god.

Card.Name: Blood Oath Binder
Card.Description: Ally: Gain +1 strength, and add two copies of the summoned creature to your void.

Card.Name: Blighted Scion
Card.Description: Afterlife: Summon a 1/1 Amazon Recruit.

Card.Name: Fallen Legion
Card.Description: Roar: If you have five or more creatures in your void, summon a Fallen Legion.

Card.Name: Ember Oni
Card.Description: Leech. Burn 2. Roar: Deal 2 damage to each other creature, and give them burn +2.

Card.Name: Leyshadow
Card.Description: Ally: Pull a creature from the board to its owner's hand. Destroy this creature.

Card.Name: Battlethirst
Card.Description: Gain blitz and protected.

Card.Name: Bloodlust
Card.Description: Gain frontline and leech.
